title: SHARP UPPER BOUNDS FOR FRACTIONAL MOMENTS OF THE RIEMANN ZETA FUNCTION
abstract: We establish sharp upper bounds for the 2kth moment of the Riemann zeta function on the critical line, for all real 0 ≤ k ≤ 2. This improves on earlier work of Ramachandra, Heath-Brown and Bettin-Chandee-Radziwiłł.
